sentences.en: ‘Do you know much about business?’ ‘Nothing at all.’
sentences.cn: “你对做生意了解得多吗？”“一窍不通。”

sentences.en: "What's up?", I said to him. — "Nothing much," he answered.
sentences.cn: “出什么事啦？”我对他说。——“没什么事，”他答道。

sentences.en: A brief search was made but they found nothing untoward.
sentences.cn: 他们简单地搜查了一番，没发现任何异常。

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: David said nothing, but simply nodded, as if understanding perfectly.
sentences.cn: 戴维什么都没说,只是点点头,好像完全理解了.

sentences.en: he died anyway, so it had all been for nothing.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，他已经死了，因此这一切都白费了。

sentences.en: he died anyway, so it had all been for nothing.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，他已经死了，因此这一切都白费了。

sentences.en: he died anyway, so it had all been for nothing.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，他已经死了，因此这一切都白费了。

sentences.en: He had nothing more to say.
sentences.cn: 他没有更多要说的了。

sentences.en: He stares detachedly into the middle distance, towards nothing in particular.
sentences.cn: 他漠然而漫无目标地注视着不远处。

sentences.en: He wants to marry her. Nothing doing!.
sentences.cn: 他想娶她。没门儿！。

sentences.en: how could you solve it with no clues, no witnesses, no nothing?.
sentences.cn: 没有线索，没有证人，什么都没有，这案子你怎么能破得了？。

sentences.en: I am expecting several important letters but nothing has arrived.
sentences.cn: 我正在等几封重要的信件，可是一封都没到。

sentences.en: I couldn’t just stand by and do nothing.
sentences.cn: 我不能就那样袖手旁观。

sentences.en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentences.en: I owe him nothing.
sentences.cn: 我不欠他什么。

sentences.en: I promised to say nothing about it to anyone.
sentences.cn: 我答应这件事对谁也不说。

sentences.en: it was nothing less than sexual harassment.
sentences.cn: 那根本就是性骚扰。

sentences.en: It's all rubbish and superstition, and there's nothing in it.
sentences.cn: 这都是废话和迷信,不是真的.

sentences.en: Jane blocked Cross's vision and he could see nothing.
sentences.cn: 简挡住了克罗斯的视线，他什么也看不见。

sentences.en: Locking up men does nothing more than keep them off the streets.
sentences.cn: 把这些人关起来只是做到了不让他们上街而已。

sentences.en: not for nothing have I a brother-in-law who cooks professionally.
sentences.cn: 我有个厨艺一流的姐夫是很有好处的。

sentences.en: nothing but the best will do.
sentences.cn: 只有最好的才行。

sentences.en: nothing but the best will do.
sentences.cn: 只有最好的才行。

sentences.en: Nothing ever happens in this town.
sentences.cn: 这镇上从来都不会发生什么特别的事。

sentences.en: She had eaten virtually nothing at supper.
sentences.cn: 晚饭她几乎什么也没吃。

sentences.en: She was a very calm person. Nothing could fluster her.
sentences.cn: 她是个非常沉着的人。没什么能让她惊慌的。

sentences.en: She’s nothing like her brother.
sentences.cn: 她一点都不像她的哥哥。

sentences.en: That's none of your business, it has nothing to do with you.
sentences.cn: 那不关你的事，与你八竿子打不着。

sentences.en: The crew of the ship gave them nothing but bread to eat.
sentences.cn: 船上的工作人员除了面包什么也不给他们吃。

sentences.en: there was &B{nothing for it but to} follow.
sentences.cn: 除了跟着（干）别无他法。

sentences.en: There was nothing else the doctors could do.
sentences.cn: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.en: There’s absolutely nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.cn: 根本没有什么好难为情的。

sentences.en: there's nothing doing, and I've been waiting for weeks.
sentences.cn: 什么事情都没发生，而我却等了好几个星期。

sentences.en: There’s nothing in this box.
sentences.cn: 这盒子里什么也没有。

sentences.en: There’s nothing new about this.
sentences.cn: 这没有什么新鲜的。

sentences.en: There’s nothing wrong with the data.
sentences.cn: 这些数据没什么差错。

sentences.en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
sentences.cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

sentences.en: We know nothing about her family.
sentences.cn: 我们对她的家庭一无所知。

sentences.en: We’ve heard nothing from her for weeks.
sentences.cn: 我们好几个星期没有她的音信了。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: With nothing but his own talent, he made himself rich and famous.
sentences.cn: 他一无所有，仅靠自身才能就变得富有而出名。

sentences.en: working for nothing.
sentences.cn: 无报酬地工作。

words.tran_cn: 虚无，不存在；空白；不存在的状态
不重要,琐碎,无价值,无意义
无,没有人,没有任何东西

phrases.tran_cn: 徒劳地，白白地；无效果地
(非正式)（用在一连串否定的最后）什么也没有
不折不扣是，十足是；完全是
没有什么能比得上；一点也不象
数量不多；没什么重要的
简直就是；无异于…；简直不比…差

trans.tran_en: to have no qualities or features that are similar to someone or something else

trans.tran_cn: 没有什么，无关紧要的事物/人，零，不值钱
trans.tran_en: if you have nothing to do with someone or something, or if someone or something has nothing to do with you, you are not involved or connected with it
